channel.title: patrolling problem
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "patrolling problem"

item.title: Re: patrolling problem
item.content:encoded:
i would say tommorrow to and hopefully but

Patrol Bonus Today: +X

X keeps changing when i patrol or someone else

but

when patrolling it does say its for tomorrow

item.title: Re: patrolling problem
item.content:encoded:
I'm going to say tomorrow for two reasons even though I have no hard evidence one way or the other right now.

1) It was like that pre-recode.
2) If it was today, that would cause a bunch of people to logon right after dayroll to Raid/Invade when no one had patrolled yet.

item.title: patrolling problem
item.content:encoded: so if you patrol is the bonus for today or tomorrow?
